description: Ben-Eliezer, Binyamin, 1936- -- Photographs; Nitzan, Meir -- Photographs
label: With plans to be the home of 300,000 residents by the end of the decade, Rishon Le Zion has been explaining itself in a new exhibition housed in the Carmel Mizrachi winery in the old part of the city.
